content: For me, one of the reasons I want to go through the momentum, the core momentum, just how are you get clients, how much business momentum exists, and it's going to occur regardless of economic conditions and so forth, is to try to help people get that even in a year when we're projecting BHG to not being a major part of the earnings growth story that we believe we have such momentum in the core banking franchise, which just goes back to the story that we've been talking about for a long, long time, all the people that we've hired, all the businesses that they're moving, all the success they're having penetrating these large banks that are giving up share that we can outrun them.
